abstract: New York Yankees continue to dominate ESPN's Sunday Night Baseball schedule despite retirement of legendary shortstop Derek Jeter.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are set to make their fourth “Sunday Night Baseball” appearance this season, meaning ESPN can feature them only twice more in that slot.

headline.main: Yankees’ Second Home: ESPN on Sunday Nights
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Second Home: ESPN on Sunday Nights

snippet: The Yankees are set to make their fourth “Sunday Night Baseball” appearance this season, meaning ESPN can feature them only twice more in that slot.
